articles.title: AI coding bot didn't take down AWS, Amazon confirms - About Amazon
articles.description: We want to address the inaccuracies in the Financial Times' reporting yesterday. The brief service interruption they reported on was the result of user error—specifically misconfigured access controls—not AI as the story claims.
